title: Enbi
synopsis: It's time for the local summer festival and Kentarou is accompanying Shizue, who has come to visit after being away for a few years. During the festival Kentarou leaves Shizue alone for a bit, and when he finds her again he sees a shocking scene...
staff: [['Murakami, Kotaro', ['Producer', ' Planning']], ['Awai, Shigeki', ['Director', ' Character Design']], ['Miyabi, Tsuzuru', ['Original Creator']]]
